meanings.sent1: The basket was filled with shiny silverberries.
meanings.sent2: I picked some ripe silverberries from the tree.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel stole all the silverberries from the garden.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter tinkled like a handful of silverberries.
meanings.sent5: The silverberries sparkled in the sunlight like tiny jewels.

meanings.definition: The fruit of a silverberry tree.
meanings.sent1: The birds feasted on the sweet silverberries.
meanings.sent2: The silverberries were plump and juicy.
meanings.sent3: The silverberries rolled down the hill, causing chaos among the animals.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes lit up at the sight of the silverberries, like a child on Christmas morning.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the silverberries filled the air with a delightful fragrance.

meanings.definition: A plant of the genus Elaeagnus, producing silver-colored berries.
meanings.sent1: The silverberries on the Elaeagnus plant glistened in the moonlight.
meanings.sent2: The silverberries were a favorite snack for the local wildlife.
meanings.sent3: The silverberries on the Elaeagnus plant seemed to whisper secrets to each other.
meanings.sent4: The silverberries on the Elaeagnus plant were like little treasures hidden in the leaves.
meanings.sent5: The silverberries on the Elaeagnus plant added a touch of magic to the garden.
